title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
overview: Foundlings are people abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born withoutÂ trace, with no identifying information, they have had no way of unlocking the secrets of their past. But in this new ground-breaking documentary series, presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind Long Lost Family combine the latest DNA technology with painstaking detective work, to enable four foundlings to finally uncover their identities.
